phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
We need you, Aang.
I need you too.
Be careful guys!
Guys?
Gyatso?
Why did you disappear?
I did not mean to.
We need you, Aang.
We need you, Aang.
We need you.
Huh?
Uh... what is going on?
Did we get captured again?
It is nothing, I just had a bad dream.
Go back to sleep.
Do not have to tell me twice.
Are you all right, Aang?
I am okay.
You seem to be having a lot of nightmares lately, you want to tell me about it?
I think I just need some rest.
You guys want to hear about my dream?
That is ok, I did not want to talk about it anyway.
Look at those clear skies, buddy!
Should be some smooth flying.
Well, we better smoothly fly ourselves to a market, because we are out of food.
Guys, wait, this was in my dream, we should not go to the market.
What happened in your dream?
Food eats people!
Also, Momo could talk.
You said some very unkind things.
There is a storm coming.
A big one.
You are out of your mind, Uncle.
The weather's perfect.
There is not a cloud in sight.
The storm is approaching from the north.
I suggest we alter our course and head southwest.
We know the Avatar is traveling northward, so we will do the same.
Prince Zuko, consider the safety of the crew.
The safety of the crew does not matter!
Finding the Avatar is far more important than any individual's safety.
He does not mean that, he is just all worked up.
Ah, it is good!
It is perfect, I am telling you!
I do not know if I like the sound of that swishing.
Swishing means it is ripe!
It is the ripe juices swishing around, eh?
I think it is true, Katara, swishing means it is ripe.
I just realized we are out of money anyway.
Out of food and out of money, now what are we supposed to do?
You could get a job, smart guy.
We should not go out there!
Please, the fish can wait.
There is going to be a terrible storm.
Ahh, you are crazy!
It is a nice day.
No clouds, no wind, no nothing, so quit you are naggin' woman.
Maybe we should find some shelter?
Are you kidding?
Shelter from what?
My joints say there is going to be a storm!
A bad one.
Well, it is your joints against my brain.
Then I hope your brain can find someone else to haul that fish, because I are not comin!
Then I will find a new fish hauler and pay him double what you get!
How do you like that?
I will go!
You are hired!
What?
You said... get a job' and he is paying double.
Double?
Who told ya that nonsense?
Uh!
Looks like your uncle was right about the storm after all.
Lucky guess.
Lieutenant, you would better learn some respect, or I will teach it to you.
What do you know about respect?
The way you talk to everyone around here,...
Then again, what should I expect from a spoiled prince?
Easy now.
Enough!
We are all a bit tired from being at sea so long.
I am sure after a bowl of noodles everyone will feel much better.
I do not need your help keeping order on my ship.
Sokka, maybe this is not such a good idea.
Look at the sky.
I said I was going to do this job.
I cannot back out just because of some bad weather.
The boy with the tattoos has some sense.
You should listen to him!
Boy with tattoos?
Airbender tattoos...
That is right.
Well do not be so smiley about it.
The Avatar disappeared for a hundred years.
You turned your back on the world!
Do not yell at him!
Aang would never turn his back on anyone!
Oh?
He would not, uh?
Then I guess I must have imagined the last hundred years of war and suffering.
Aang is the bravest person I know!
He has done nothing but help people and save lives since I met him.
It is not his fault he disappeared, right Aang?
Aang?
What is wrong?
That is right!
Keep flyin!
You are a horrible old man!
Appa, yip!
Yip!
Hey, they left without saying goodbye!
You are friends are not too polite, are they?
I know!
This one time I was...
Yeh, yeh, yeh, yeh, get below deck.
I am sorry for running away.
It is ok.
That fisherman was way out of line.
Actually, he was not.
What do you mean?
I do not want to talk about it.
It has to do with your dream, does not it?
Talk to me.
Well, it is kind of a long story.
I am going to try to get a little fire going.
I will never forget the day the monks told me I was the Avatar.
I was playing with some other kids just outside the south wall.
I was trying to teach them how to do the air scooter...
First, you form a ball.
Then you got to get on quick.
Okay!
Here goes!
Quick, get on!
You kind of have to balance on it like it is a top.
Man, that is hard.
Where did ya learn that trick, Aang?
I made it up.
Aang, come with us.
We need to speak with you.
How do you know it is me?
We have known you were the Avatar for some time.
Do you remember these?
Those were some of my favorite toys when I was little!
You chose them from among thousands of toys, Aang.
The toys you picked were the four Avatar relics.
These items belonged to Avatars past.
Your own past lives.
I just chose them because they seemed fun.
You chose them because they were familiar.
Normally we would have told you of your identity when you turned to sixteen,...
I fear that war may be upon us, young Avatar.
We need you, Aang.
I am sick of taking his orders and I am tired of chasing his Avatar!
I mean who does Zuko think he is?
Do you really want to know?
General Iroh!
We were just...
It is ok.
May I join you?
Of course, Sir!
Try to understand, my nephew is a complicated young man.
He has been through much...
Let me in!
Prince Zuko, what is wrong?
I want to go into the war chamber, but the guard will not let me pass!
You are not missing anything, trust me.
These meetings are dreadfully boring.
If I am going to rule this nation one day,...
Very well.
But you must promise not to speak.
These old folks are a bit sensitive, you know.
Thank you uncle!
The Earth Kingdom defenses are concentrated here.
A dangerous battalion of their strongest earthbenders and fiercest warriors,...
But the 41st is entirely new recruits.
How do you expect them to defeat a powerful Earth Kingdom battalion?
I do not.
They will be used as a distraction while we mount an attack from the rear.
What better to use as bait then fresh meat?
You cannot sacrifice an entire division like that!
Those soldiers love and defend our nation!
How can you betray them?
Zuko was right, you see, but it was not his place to speak out,...
So you were upset that you were the Avatar?
Why would not you be excited about it?
Well, I did not know how to feel about it.
All I knew is that after I found out, everything began changing...
Hey, not bad!
You guys have been practicing!
Not only that, we made up a game you can play with the air scooters!
Great!
What is going on?
Now that you are the Avatar,...
But I am still the same... nothing's changed.
So, what, I cannot play?
That is the only fair way.
Oh, ok.
Sorry, Aang.
Okay, now who wants to have Jinju on their team?
Very interesting move, young one.
What do you mean?
Hey!
You are playing games with him?
The Avatar should be training.
Aang has already trained enough for today.
Time is short.
Come with me.
I must test you on some high level techniques.
No, as long as I am his guardian,...
After Zuko's outburst in the meeting, the Fire Lord became very angry with him.
He said that Prince Zuko's challenge of the general was an act of complete...
Agni kai.
A fire duel.
That is right.
Zuko looked upon the old general he had insulted and declared that he was not afraid.
But Zuko misunderstood.
When he turned to face his opponent,...
Zuko had spoken out against a general's plan,...
Zuko would have to duel his own father.
Then, just when I was starting to feel better, something worse happened.
Aang needs to have freedom and fun.
He needs to grow up as a normal boy.
Humph!
You cannot keep protecting him from his destiny.
Gyatso, I know you mean well,...
All I want is what is best for him.
But what we need is what is best for the world.
You and Aang must be separated.
The Avatar will be sent away to the Eastern Air Temple to complete his training.
That is awful, Aang.
I do not know what to say.
How could they do that to me!
They wanted to take away everything I knew and everyone I loved!
Whoa!
Hot cinders!
I am sorry I got so mad.
You have a right to be angry after the monks sent you away like that.
Well, that is not exactly what happened...
I was afraid and confused.
I did not know what to do.
Aang, I am not going to let them take you away from me.
Aang?
I never saw Gyatso again.
Next thing I knew, I was waking up in your arms after you found me in the iceberg.
You ran away.
And then the Fire Nation attacked our temple.
My people needed me and I was not there to help.
You do not know what would have...
The world needed me and I was not there to help.
Aang...
The fisherman was right!
I did turn my back on the world.
You are being too hard on yourself.
Even if you did run away, I think it was meant to be.
If you had stayed you would have been killed along with all the other airbenders.
You do not know that.
I know it is meant to be this way.
The world needs you now.
You give people hope.
When Prince Zuko saw that it was his father who had come to duel him,...
Please, father, I only had the fire nation's best interest at heart!
I am sorry I spoke out of turn!
You will fight for your honor.
I meant you no disrespect.
I am your loyal son.
Rise and fight, Prince Zuko!
I will not fight you.
You will learn respect, and suffering will be your teacher.
I looked away.
I always thought that Prince Zuko was in a training accident...
It was no accident.
After the duel, the Fire Lord said that by refusing to fight,...
As punishment he was banished and sent to capture the Avatar.
Only then could he return with his honor.
So that is why he is so obsessed.
Capturing the Avatar is the only chance he has of things returning to normal.
Things will never return to normal.
But the important thing is, the Avatar gives Zuko hope.
Help!
Oh, please help!
It is ok, you are safe.
But, my husband is not.
What do you mean?
Where is Sokka?
They have not returned.
They should have been back by now,...
I am going to find them.
I am going with you.
I am staying here!
We will be back soon, I promise.
Where were we hit?
I do not know!
Look!
The helmsman!
Where are they?
Come on, Appa!
The boat!
It is there!
The Avatar!
What do you want to do, Sir?
Let him go.
We need to get this ship to safety.
Then we must head directly into the eye of the storm.
I am too young to die!
I am not, but I still do not want to!
Hang on to the rope!
Uncle, I am sorry.
Your apology is accepted.
Oh, you are alive!
You owe this boy an apology.
He does not have to apologize.
Mmm, uh, what if instead of an apology I give him a free fish and we call it even?
Actually, I do not eat meat.
Fish are not meat.
Seriously, you are still going to pay me, right?
Katara, I think you were right before.
I am done dwelling on the past.
Really?
I cannot make guesses about how things would have turned out if I had not run away.
I am here now and I am going to make the most of it.
I do not think you are going to have those nightmares anymore.
Uh, if you were not here now, well, I guess I would not be either.
Thank you for saving my life, Avatar.
Do you hear that?
It is stopped raining.
Appa!
